Class MBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Servers.bus.MBus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDriverBus, java.rmi.Remote, IPassengerBus, IBus

    public class MBus
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBus
    Class that implements the Bus server services.
    Author:
    Filipe Teixeira , Miguel Azevedo

        nSeats - Te number of seats on the bus.

        genRep - The General Repository
        numEntities - Te number of entities that will use the VectorClock at the same time
